00028 #include "dbprim.h"
00029 #include "dbprim_int.h"
00030 
00031 RCSTAG("@(#)$Id: rn__init_8c-source.html,v 1.3 2006/09/04 15:12:17 spale Exp $");
00032 
00033 unsigned long
00034 rn_init(rb_node_t *node, void *value)
00035 {
00036   initialize_dbpr_error_table(); /* initialize error table */
00037 
00038   if (!node) /* verify arguments */
00039     return DB_ERR_BADARGS;
00040 
00041   /* initialize the node */
00042   node->rn_color = RB_COLOR_NONE;
00043   node->rn_tree = 0;
00044   node->rn_parent = 0;
00045   node->rn_left = 0;
00046   node->rn_right = 0;
00047   node->rn_key.dk_key = 0;
00048   node->rn_key.dk_len = 0;
00049   node->rn_value = value;
00050 
00051   node->rn_magic = RB_NODE_MAGIC; /* set the magic number */
00052 
00053   return 0;
00054 }
